commands.name: az attestation policy reset
commands.summary: Resets the attestation policy for the specified tenant and reverts     to the default policy.
commands.syntax:
az attestation policy reset --attestation-type {OpenEnclave, SevSnpVm, SgxEnclave, Tpm}
                            [--id]
                            [--name]
                            [--policy-jws]
                            [--resource-group]

commands.name: az attestation policy set
commands.summary: Sets the policy for a given kind of attestation type.
commands.syntax:
az attestation policy set --attestation-type {OpenEnclave, SevSnpVm, SgxEnclave, Tpm}
                          [--id]
                          [--name]
                          [--new-attestation-policy]
                          [--new-attestation-policy-file]
                          [--policy-format]
                          [--resource-group]
examples: az attestation policy set -n "myattestationprovider" -g "MyResourceGroup" --attestation-type SGX-OpenEnclaveSDK --new-attestation-policy "{JWT}" --policy-format JWT
az attestation policy set -n "myattestationprovider" -g "MyResourceGroup" --attestation-type SGX-OpenEnclaveSDK --new-attestation-policy-file "{file_name}" --policy- format JWT

commands.name: az attestation policy show
commands.summary: Retrieves the current policy for a given kind of attestation type.
commands.syntax:
az attestation policy show --attestation-type {OpenEnclave, SevSnpVm, SgxEnclave, Tpm}
                           [--id]
                           [--name]
                           [--resource-group]
